name: webpack-config
description: Standardized webpack configuration for compiling my github repositories without a dedicated webpack.config.js

scripts.stylelint:all: npm run stylelint:theme && npm run stylelint:campaign-tracker && npm run stylelint:editor-tools
scripts.eslint:all: npm run eslint:theme && npm run eslint:campaign-tracker && npm run eslint:editor-tools
scripts.prettier:all: npm run prettier:theme && npm run prettier:editor-tools && npm run prettier:campaign-tracker
scripts.install:all: npm i && npm run install:theme && npm run install:editor-tools && npm run install:campaign-tracker
scripts.translate-files: cd ./themes/custom/varian && po2json ./translations/varian.de.po ./build/json/varian.de.json && po2json ./translations/varian.en-au.po ./build/json/varian.en-au.json && po2json ./translations/varian.en-gb.po ./build/json/varian.en-gb.json && po2json ./translations/varian.es-419.po ./build/json/varian.es-419.json && po2json ./translations/varian.es.po ./build/json/varian.es.json && po2json ./translations/varian.fr.po ./build/json/varian.fr.json && po2json ./translations/varian.ja.po ./build/json/varian.ja.json && po2json ./translations/varian.pt-br.po ./build/json/varian.pt-br.json && po2json ./translations/varian.pt-pt.po ./build/json/varian.pt-pt.json && po2json ./translations/varian.zh-hans.po ./build/json/varian.zh-hans.json && po2json ./translations/varian.zh-hant.po ./build/json/varian.zh-hant.json && cd ../../..
scripts.build:platform: npm run install:all && npm run translate-files && webpack --mode production
scripts.build:prod: npm run translate-files && npm run prettier:all && npm run eslint:all && npm run stylelint:all && webpack --mode production

author: Ian Rogren
